tidbits.title: Historical Richness
tidbits.description: Yemen has a rich history, with ancient cities like Sana'a boasting unique architecture and being a UNESCO World Heritage site.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a diverse cultural heritage, reflected in its music, dance, cuisine, and traditions, shaped by Arab, African, and Persian influences.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Conflict
tidbits.description: Yemen has faced significant challenges, including political instability, humanitarian crises, and conflict, impacting its people and economy.
